DESCRIPTION: Creates a copy of itself that will be added to your hand or your draw pile if your hand is full in a certain number of turns.
Copies of cards that are added to your hand in future turns.
Apply one Strength and Vulnerable to a selected Target.
Whenever you play a skill this turn, the targeted enemy looses one strength for this turn.
A zero cost skill, that applies one weak to a target and exhausts.
Each Stack of Brittle decreases block gained from cards by 15%. Each Turn reduce Brittle by 1
Each Stack of Fragile increases incoming Attack Damage by 10% per stack. Each Turn reduce Fragile by 1
